tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FertilizerRecommendations (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_id INT,
   recommended_fertilizer VARCHAR(255),
   recommended_amount FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES CropData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE SoilQuality (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  pH FLOAT,
  moisture_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE NutrientLevels (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  soil_id INT,
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT,
  potassium_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CropRecommendations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  nutrient_requirement VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FertilizerInventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fertilizer_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE FarmerData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_name VARCHAR(255),
  soil_id INT
)
